keywords: ['low quality audio', 'tibetan singing bowl', 'animal sounds', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'meditation music']
caption: This audio clip features the sound produced at a particular frequency by a Tibetan singing bowl. This produces a continuous ringing sound. Toward the end of the clip, some other animal sounds can be heard. There are no other instruments in this song. This song can be played at a meditation center.
